channel.title: [317][Delta] Unholy PK [Delta][317]
channel.description:
[center][b][size=36pt]Unholy PK Version 1.0[/size][/b][/center]
[b] I do not have a client you can use, for the client I used while coding this is still under development, try searching around for Deltascape v16, or Bluurr's client, please note that with bluurr's, you must remove some code so that it may connect, otherwise you'll just disconnect. You will not be able to see Chivarly & Piety with Delta16, you will also crash while viewing the Lunar Interface)
Before commenting, please note that I started from the original Delta (Based in falador) With no other updates, I didn't spend long developing this, just changed a few basic things, expect decent updates in Version 2, this source may prove useful for a base)[/b]
[center][u][b]Server Features[/b][/u] Changed the starter Changed beginner training Edited shops, but raised items prises to keep an economy Increased Exp from 120 to 890 Removed the quest requirements for weilding weapons Added more drops to monsters, (Ie Chaos elemental now drops D boots & Dust devils drop D chain) Started on Duel Arena Fixed items wearing in the wrong slots Removed some uneeded code (Not much)
[u][b]Client features (The official client will be released with Version 2, 100% Credits to Sellzy Jr from R-S)[/b][/u] New Hp Bars New Hit splats New 0 Damage hits (shields) Fixed models for a lot of items
[u][b]Old falador home, new starter[/b][/u] [IMG]http://i301.photobucket.com/albums/nn72/localwoodcut/UnholyPic1.jpg[/img]
[u][b]New training area (Warrior was moved to here, so you can still start Lost City)[/b][/u] [IMG]http://i301.photobucket.com/albums/nn72/localwoodcut/UnholyPic2.jpg[/img]
[u][b]You still have to complete quests, but not to wear items[/b][/u] [IMG]http://i301.photobucket.com/albums/nn72/localwoodcut/UnholyPic3.jpg[/img]
[u][b]Changed shop stock and what they sell, but made sure I economised the server still.[/b][/u] [IMG]http://i301.photobucket.com/albums/nn72/localwoodcut/UnholyPic4.jpg[/img]
[u][b]Giles' store (The last four items become buy-able after the completion of 'Wolfs cure'[/b][/u] [IMG]http://i301.photobucket.com/albums/nn72/localwoodcut/unholypic5.jpg[/img]
[u]Download links[/u] Mediafire: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/file/d5n2kmn3u2v/Unholy%20PK.rar]http://www.mediafire.com/file/d5n2kmn3u2v/Unholy%20PK.rar[/url] UppIT: [url=http://uppit.com/v/1UQVQIV1]http://uppit.com/v/1UQVQIV1[/url] MegaUpload: [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=9K1VROS4]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=9K1VROS4[/url]
[u][b]Version 2 Updates [Server & Client][/b][/u] Finishing Duel Arena Adding Combat Interface Adding 474 Prayer interface Adding 474 Magic interface (Perhaps with magic shorting) Will change a lot more current content Godsword stances/Specials 100% Barrelchest anchor & Saradomin sword. Will fix up the barrows minigame Have a couple of new quests in mind Might start working on skills[/center]

item.title: [317][Delta] Unholy PK [Delta][317]
item.dc:creator: @The_Unholy The Unholy
item.description:
@The_Unholy wrote:

I didn’t change a great deal in this one, just a few things, made drops more realistic and closer to Runescapes (Meaning the dust devil now drops Dragon chain, Tzhaar monsters drop Onyx Necklace) Varieties like that.
Changed the XP rate, rewards of quests, moved training area, very little work done here, but, version 2 has VAST improvements in the hundreds (:

Read full topic

item.title: [317][Delta] Unholy PK [Delta][317]
item.dc:creator: @The_Unholy The Unholy
item.description:
@The_Unholy wrote:

You see it from my point of view, there is a relatively high XP rate, and most of the rare items would be considered PKing gear, therefore making PKing just as good a way of money making then skilling therefore it would balance out the economy somewhat more.

Read full topic

item.title: [317][Delta] Unholy PK [Delta][317]
item.dc:creator: @Lee_Terry Lee Terry
item.description:
@Lee_Terry wrote:

The delta economy was too up-tight.

Delta overpowered the server making most items worth money / rare.

Magic bows were even rare in deltascape , i think that’s possibly the only server i have ever seen a magic bow worth a lot.
I agree with your decision and that you were the creator of the source you should not have to deal with a single opinion on how your economy on your source is run , Ignore negative feedback and try to carry on with the economy how you like it.

Read full topic

item.title: [317][Delta] Unholy PK [Delta][317]
item.dc:creator: @The_Unholy The Unholy
item.description:
@The_Unholy wrote:

I don’t want a stupid economy like Delta, the 10m and 1,000 Sharks are to get people started, if people wish too, they can add timers to stop this being X-Fered, and you still have to work to obtain items, as most of it is highly priced.
Items like godswords, dragon equiptment and combat accessories still have to be obtained the hard way, thus enabling an economy.

Read full topic

item.title: [317][Delta] Unholy PK [Delta][317]
item.dc:creator: @Lee_Terry Lee Terry
item.description:
@Lee_Terry wrote:

This is a very nice start to a source that in my opinion will go far.

I’d like to see the finished development on v1 , I recommend not working on v2 until all of the v1 Client and Server interfaces are complete.

Scape-JAVA:

trying to keep an economy and then the starter is 10m and 1k sharks.

As he said ^ Start with 1k Lobsters and sell sharks in the store , they will sell out fast , creating a vast economy.

Read full topic

item.title: [317][Delta] Unholy PK [Delta][317]
item.dc:creator: @The_Unholy The Unholy
item.description:
@The_Unholy wrote:

[center][size=36pt]Unholy PK Version 1.0[/size][/center]

[b]
I do not have a client you can use, for the client I used while coding this is still under development, try searching around for Deltascape v16, or Bluurr’s client, please note that with bluurr’s, you must remove some code so that it may connect, otherwise you’ll just disconnect. You will not be able to see Chivarly & Piety with Delta16, you will also crash while viewing the Lunar Interface)

Before commenting, please note that I started from the original Delta (Based in falador) With no other updates, I didn’t spend long developing this, just changed a few basic things, expect decent updates in Version 2, this source may prove useful for a base)[/b]

[center]Server Features
Changed the starter
Changed beginner training
Edited shops, but raised items prises to keep an economy
Increased Exp from 120 to 890
Removed the quest requirements for weilding weapons
Added more drops to monsters, (Ie Chaos elemental now drops D boots & Dust devils drop D chain)
Started on Duel Arena
Fixed items wearing in the wrong slots
Removed some uneeded code (Not much)

Client features (The official client will be released with Version 2, 100% Credits to Sellzy Jr from R-S)
New Hp Bars
New Hit splats
New 0 Damage hits (shields)
Fixed models for a lot of items

Old falador home, new starter

UnholyPic1.jpg756×338

New training area (Warrior was moved to here, so you can still start Lost City)

You still have to complete quests, but not to wear items

Changed shop stock and what they sell, but made sure I economised the server still.

Giles’ store (The last four items become buy-able after the completion of ‘Wolfs cure’

Download links
Mediafire: http://www.mediafire.com/file/d5n2kmn3u2v/Unholy%20PK.rar
UppIT: http://uppit.com/v/1UQVQIV1
MegaUpload: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=9K1VROS4

Version 2 Updates [Server & Client]
Finishing Duel Arena
Adding Combat Interface
Adding 474 Prayer interface
Adding 474 Magic interface (Perhaps with magic shorting)
Will change a lot more current content
Godsword stances/Specials
100% Barrelchest anchor & Saradomin sword.
Will fix up the barrows minigame
Have a couple of new quests in mind
Might start working on skills[/center]

Read full topic
